attributes.action: to enable all smokers to obtain champix wherever they live
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i have just been refused champix because my local health authority does not fund it's use, i have numerous health issues and have tried everything on the market without success or contra-indications.given i live in the area with the highest death rate for smoking related disease it seems laughable that this should be the case and with the smoking ban in force even more so!
